channel.title: Products on Aardvark Bark
channel.description: Recent content in Products on Aardvark Bark

item.title: Fine Red Bark
item.description: Fine Red Bark – Fine for the size, red for the color. Made from 100% virgin fir and hemlock tree bark native to the northwest. The bark is screened and processes to be 5/8” minus in size. Fine red bark when installed in landscaping applications has a smooth appearance, fresh bark smell and color.

item.title: Medium Red Bark
item.description: Medium for the size, red for the color. Made from 100% virgin fir and hemlock tree bark native to the northwest. The bark is processed to be 5/8” minus in size. Medium bark is the most popular for its wide range of landscaping applications and its price being the most economical.

item.title: Play Chips
item.description: Our Premium playground engineered wood fiber wood chips are manufactured and designed specifically for installing under and around Playgrounds and play structures.
